info.title: App Store Connect Adapters
info.description: HTTP API for querying an App Store Connect adapters host.

get.summary: Gets information about all registered adapters that are visible to the caller.

200.description:
Successful responses contain a collection of AdapterDescriptor 
objects.

get.summary: Gets information about the specified adapter.

200.description:
Successful responses contain the AdapterDescriptorExtended for the 
requested adapter.

get.summary:
Browses the asset model hierarchy. Up to MaxNodesPerQuery will be 
returned.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description:
The optional starting node ID. If no value is specified, browsing will start at the 
top-level nodes in the hierarchy.

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: The maximum depth of node to retrieve.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The page size for the query.

200.description: Successful responses contain the matching AssetModelNode objects.

post.summary:
Browses the asset model hierarchy. Up to MaxNodesPerQuery will be 
returned.

200.description: Successful responses contain the matching AssetModelNode objects.

post.summary: Gets a collection of nodes by ID. Up to MaxNodesPerQuery will be returned.

requestBody.description: The request object describing the nodes to retrieve.

200.description: Successful responses contain the matching AssetModelNode objects.

post.summary:
Finds nodes matching the specified search filter. Up to MaxNodesPerQuery 
will be returned.

requestBody.description: The request object describing the nodes to retrieve.

200.description: Successful responses contain the matching AssetModelNode objects.

post.summary: Reads historical event messages for the specified time range.

200.description: Successful responses contain a collection of EventMessage objects.

post.summary: Reads historical event messages starting at the specified cursor position.

200.description:
Successful responses contain a collection of EventMessageWithCursorPosition 
objects.

post.summary:
Writes event messages to an adapter. Up to MaxEventMessagesPerWriteRequest 
messages can be written in a single request.
post.description:
Up to MaxEventMessagesPerWriteRequest values can be written to the 
adapter in a single request. Subsequent values will be ignored. No corresponding 
WriteEventMessageResult object will be returned for these items.

parameters.name: adapterId
parameters.description: The adapter ID to write to.

200.description:
Successful responses contain a collection of WriteEventMessageResult 
objects (one per sample written).

get.summary: Gets information about the hosting application.

200.description:
Successful responses contain a HostInfo object describing the hosting 
application.

post.summary: Reads tag value annotations from an adapter.

200.description: Successful responses contain a collection of TagValueAnnotationQueryResult objects.

parameters.name: tagId
parameters.description: The tag ID for the annotation.

200.description: Successful responses contain the matching TagValueAnnotation object.

put.summary: Deletes an annotation on a tag.

200.description:
Successful responses contain a WriteTagValueAnnotationResult 
describing the operation.

delete.summary: Deletes an annotation on a tag.

200.description:
Successful responses contain a WriteTagValueAnnotationResult 
describing the operation.

post.summary: Creates an annotation on a tag.

200.description:
Successful responses contain a WriteTagValueAnnotationResult 
describing the operation.

post.summary: Performs a tag search on an adapter.

200.description: Successful responses contain a collection of TagDefinition objects.

get.summary: Performs a tag search on an adapter.

200.description: Successful responses contain a collection of TagDefinition objects.

Successful responses contain a collection of matching TagDefinition 
objects.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: The IDs of the tags to retrieve.

200.description:
Successful responses contain a collection of matching TagDefinition 
objects.

parameters.name: adapterId
parameters.description: The ID of the adapter to query.

200.description: Successful responses contain the snapshot values for the requested tags.

parameters.name: adapterId
parameters.description: The ID of the adapter to query.

200.description: Successful responses contain the raw values for the requested tags.

post.description:
Plot data is intended to provide visualization-friendly data sets for display in e.g. 
charts.

parameters.name: adapterId
parameters.description: The ID of the adapter to query.

200.description: Successful responses contain the plot values for the requested tags.

parameters.name: adapterId
parameters.description: The ID of the adapter to query.

200.description: Successful responses contain the interpolated values for the requested tags.

post.summary: Requests tag values at specific timestamps.

parameters.name: adapterId
parameters.description: The ID of the adapter to query.

200.description: Successful responses contain the values for the requested tags at the requested times.

post.description:
Processed data queries are used to request aggregated values for tags. The functions 
supported vary by data source. The DefaultDataFunctions class defines
constants for commonly-supported aggregate functions.

parameters.name: adapterId
parameters.description: The ID of the adapter to query.

200.description:
Successful responses contain the aggregated values for the requested tags and data 
functions.

get.summary: Requests the aggregate functions that can be specified when requesting processed data.
get.description:
Processed data queries are used to request aggregated values for tags. The functions 
supported vary by data source. The DefaultDataFunctions class defines
constants for commonly-supported aggregate functions.

parameters.name: adapterId
parameters.description: The ID of the adapter to query.

200.description:
Successful responses contain descriptors for the aggregated function names that can 
be specified.

post.summary:
Writes values to an adapter's snapshot. Up to MaxSamplesPerWriteRequest 
values can be written in a single request.
post.description:
Up to MaxSamplesPerWriteRequest values can be written to the adapter 
in a single request. Subsequent values will be ignored. No corresponding 
WriteTagValueResult object will be returned for these items.

parameters.name: adapterId
parameters.description: The ID of the adapter to write to.

200.description:
Successful responses contain a collection of WriteTagValueResult 
objects (one per sample written).

post.summary:
Writes values to an adapter's historical archive. Up to MaxSamplesPerWriteRequest
values can be written in a single request.
post.description:
Up to MaxSamplesPerWriteRequest values can be written to the adapter 
in a single request. Subsequent values will be ignored. No corresponding 
WriteTagValueResult object will be returned for these items.

parameters.name: adapterId
parameters.description: The ID of the adapter to write to.

200.description:
Successful responses contain a collection of WriteTagValueResult 
objects (one per sample written).

AdapterDescriptor.description: A descriptor for an App Store Connect adapter.

id.description:
The identifier for the adapter. This can be any type of value, as long as it is unique 
within the hosting application, and does not change.

allOf.description:
An extended descriptor for an adapter, that includes information about the features that the 
adapter has implemented.

features.description: The names of the implemented standard adapter features.

extensions.description: The names of the implemented extension adapter features.

AssetModelNode.description: Describes a node in an adapter's asset model.

id.description: The unique identifier for the node.

parent.description: The parent ID of the node. Top-level nodes will have a value of null.

children.description: The IDs of the child nodes of this node.

measurements.description: The measurements associated with the node.

properties.description: Additional properties associated with the node.

AssetModelNodeMeasurement.description:
Describes a measurement on an asset model node. Note that the measurement can be provided 
from a tag on a different adapter to the one that the node is defined on.

adapterId.description: The ID of the adapter that the tag for the measurement is defined on.

tag.description: The tag identifier for the measurement.

TagIdentifier.description: Defines basic information for identifying a real-time data tag.

id.description: The unique identifier for the tag.

BrowseAssetModelNodesRequest.description: Describes a request to browse nodes in an adapter's asset model.

parentId.description:
The ID of the parent node to start at. Specify null to request top-level 
nodes.

depth.description:
The maximum number of hierarchy levels to request. Specify less than one to request all 
levels below the ParentId.

pageSize.description: The page size for the query.

page.description: The page number for the query.

GetAssetModelNodesRequest.description: Describes a request to get asset model nodes by ID.

nodes.description: The IDs of the nodes to retrieve.

FindAssetModelNodesRequest.description: Describes a request to search for asset model nodes.

pageSize.description: The page size for the query.

page.description: The page number for the query.

allOf.description: Describes a message generated by e.g. an alarms & events system.

EventMessageBase.description: Base class describing a message generated by e.g. an alarms & events system.

id.description: A unique identifier for the event.

utcEventTime.description: The UTC timestamp of the event.

priority.description: The priority associated with the event.

EventPriority.description: Describes the priority associated with an event message.

allOf.description: Describes a request to retrieve historical event messages using a time range.

utcStartTime.description: The UTC start time for the request.

utcEndTime.description: The UTC end time for the request.

allOf.description: Base class for adapter requests related to reading historical event messages.

direction.description:
The event read direction. When Backwards is specified, 
the resulting events will be returned in descending order of time.

messageCount.description:
The maximum number of event messages to retrieve. A value of less than one is interpreted 
as meaning no limit. The adapter that handles the request can apply its own maximum limit 
to the query.

EventReadDirection.description: Describes the read direction for a historical event message read operation.

AdapterRequest.description: Base class that adapter request objects can inherit from.

properties.description:
Additional request properties. These can be used to provide bespoke query parameters 
supported by the adapter.

allOf.description: Describes a message generated by e.g. an alarms & events system that also contains a cursor position.

cursorPosition.description: The cursor position for the event message.

allOf.description: Describes a request to retrieve historical event messages using a cursor to specified the query start position.

cursorPosition.description: The cursor position to start the query at.

allOf.description: Describes the result of an event message write operation.

correlationId.description: The optional correlation ID for the operation.

WriteOperationResult.description: Base class for result objects returned from write operations.

status.description: Indicates if the write was successful.

properties.description: Additional properties related to the write.

WriteStatus.description: Describes the status of a write operation.

WriteEventMessagesRequest.description: Describes a request to write event messages to an adapter.

WriteEventMessageItem.description: Describes an event message being written to an adapter.

correlationId.description: The optional correlation ID for the operation.

version.description: The Semantic Versioning v2 (https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html) application version.

properties.description: Custom properties supplied by the hosting application.

VendorInfo.description: Describes the vendor for the hosting application.

allOf.description: Describes a result for an annotations query on a tag.
Describes an annotation on a tag.

id.description: The unique identifier for the annotation.

TagValueAnnotationBase.description: Describes the base set of properties for a tag value annotation.

utcStartTime.description: The UTC start time for the annotation.

utcEndTime.description:
The UTC end time for the annotation. If AnnotationType is 
Instantaneous, this property will always be 
null.

description.description: An additional description or explanation of the annotation.

AnnotationType.description: Specifies the type of an annotation.

TagDataContainer.description: Describes a base class for data associated with a tag.

allOf.description: Describes a request to read annotations on tag values.

annotationCount.description: The maximum number of annotations to retrieve per tag.

allOf.description: Describes a generic request to retrieve historical data from a set of tags.

utcStartTime.description: The UTC start time for the request.

utcEndTime.description: The UTC end time for the request.

allOf.description: Base class for requests that query tags for data.

tags.description: The tag names or IDs to query.

allOf.description: Describes the result of a tag value annotation write operation.

tagId.description: The ID of the tag that the annotation operation was performed on.

id.description: The unique identifier for the tag.

category.description: The tag measurement category (e.g. temperature, pressure, mass).

states.description:
The discrete states for the tag. If DataType is not State, 
this property will be null.

TagDataType.description: Describes the data type for a tag.

other.description: Additional filters on bespoke tag properties.

pageSize.description: The page size for the query.

page.description: The page number for the query.

GetTagsRequest.description: Describes a request to get tag definitions by tag ID or name.

tags.description: The IDs or names of the tags to retrieve.

allOf.description: Describes a value returned by a tag value query.
Describes a real-time or historical value on a tag.

error.description: An error message associated with the value.

TagValueBase.description: Describes the base set of properties for a tag value.

utcSampleTime.description: The UTC sample time for the value.

numericValue.description:
The numeric value for the tag. This can differ from the text value on state-based and 
non-numeric tags.

textValue.description:
The text value for the tag. This can differ from the numeric value on state-based and 
non-numeric tags.

status.description: The quality status for the value.

TagValueStatus.description: Describes the quality status of a tag value.

allOf.description: Describes a request for snapshot (i.e. instantaneous) tag values.
Describes a request to retrieve raw tag values.

sampleCount.description:
The maximum number of samples to retrieve per tag. A value of less than one is interpreted 
as meaning no limit. The adapter that handles the request can apply its own maximum limit 
to the query.

boundaryType.description:
The boundary type to use for the query. This controls if only values inside the query time 
range should be included in the result, or if the values immediately before and immediately 
after the query time range should be included.

RawDataBoundaryType.description: Describes a boundary type used when making a raw data query.

allOf.description: Describes a request for visualization-friendly tag values.

intervals.description:
The number of time intervals to use in the query. While the sample count may vary according 
to the implementation of the adapter handling the query, callers should expect to receive 
a number of samples equal to up to 4-5x the interval count.

allOf.description: Describes a request for interpolated data on a set of tags.

sampleInterval.description: The sample interval for the interpolation.

allOf.description: Describes a request to retrieve tag values at specific sample times.

utcSampleTimes.description: The UTC sample times to retrieve values at.

allOf.description: Describes a value returned by a tag value query for processed data.

dataFunction.description: The data function used to aggregate the tag value.

allOf.description: Describes a request to retrieve processed (aggregated) tag values.

dataFunctions.description: The aggregate data functions to request.

sampleInterval.description: The sample interval to use in the aggregation.

DataFunctionDescriptor.description: Describes a data function that is supported when making a call for historical process data.

allOf.description: Describes the result of a tag value write operation.

correlationId.description: The optional correlation ID for the operation.

WriteTagValuesRequest.description: Describes a request to write snapshot or historical tag values.

WriteTagValueItem.description: Describes a value being written to a tag.

correlationId.description: An optional correlation ID to assign to the write operation.
